results.name: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = sigma((2^n)-1) - sigma((2^(n-1))-1), where sigma is A000203, the sum of divisors.
link: Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
xref: From second term onwards, the first differences of A075708.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 08 2019
